title: Building Virtual World-Based Mathematical Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: The process of geographically dispersed learners engaging in collaborative mathematical problem-solving activities in a smartphone-based virtual environment

learning_goals: Simulate mathematical modeling processes by navigating 3D spaces in a virtual world platform.
Derive strategies for solving complex mathematical problems through group collaboration activities using virtual avatars.
Improve the quality of interaction with peer learners by over 80% through a VR-based feedback system.

resources: Mobile-Compatible Virtual World Platform (Geenshot, Hubs, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
